articles.author: Robin Schmidt
articles.description:
Inventory Staking is a brand new feature added to the NFTX V2 Protocol, allowing anyone to add their floor-priced NFTs to a vault and stake their position on the Stake page to receive part of the vault fees. This allows you to receive a passive income on all your floor NFTs which you otherwise would …
  Earn Passive Income With Idle NFTs Using Inventory Staking on NFTx Read More »
articles.title: Earn Passive Income With Idle NFTs Using Inventory Staking on NFTx
